testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to delete hub information with the specified id number via API connection.
testcase.name: admin Send a DELETE request to the api/hub/delete/{id} endpoint with valid authorization and correct id, verify
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/hub/delete/421" path parameters....................passed * The api user sends a DELETE request and saves the returned response.......passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Deleted"..passed * The api user verifies that the data Deleted id information in the returned response body is the same as the id path parameter written in the endpoint..passed
